name: Introduction to Photography
description: An introduction to the basics of photography, including the fundamentals of composition, lighting, and camera operation.

name: Digital Photography
description: An introduction to digital photography, including learning digital software and techniques for editing photos.

name: Studio Photography
description: A course on studio photography, including setting up and taking photographs in a studio setting.

name: Portrait Photography
description: A course on portrait photography, including techniques for taking professional photos of people.

name: Landscape Photography
description: A course on landscape photography, including techniques for taking professional photos of scenery.

name: Fine Art Photography
description: A course on fine art photography, including techniques for creating artistic photographs.
